MNG-455.summary: Access to the artifact list of a plugin
MNG-455.nl_input:
Access to the artifact list of a plugin
When making plugins that will fork a java process and when this process requires all the dependencies of the plugin to be on the classpath this would be needed.
MNG-455.description: When making plugins that will fork a java process and when this process requires all the dependencies of the plugin to be on the classpath this would be needed.
